section.title: Overview
section.p: Suppose you have an iPhone, which is associated with a monetary bucket for consumption of data services. The data bundle is subscribed to the iPhone and monetary bucket is configured to expire after 60 days from purchase. When you initiate a data call on your iPhone, the monetary bucket is charged for its data services.
When the data bundle is about to expire in 10 days, 5 days, 1 day and at expiry, an email is sent to your registered email ID notifying you about the approaching expiry date.

ul.li: Create a device lifecycle with defined states.

Associate the device (which is, iPhone) with a monetary bucket of 10 United States dollars for consumption of data services. The data is consumed from the monetary bucket at a defined rate. For example, either data is charged 0.125 United States dollars per 25 MB of data consumed or data is charged at 1 United States dollar from the Prepaid account per 15 minutes of data consumed.
Configure a data bundle subscription to expire in 60 days from the purchase.
Configure to send notifications at 10 days, 5 days, 1 day before expiry and also when the bundle is expired.
Initiate a data call from your iPhone and the call is charged from the monetary bucket balance.
Verify that the data call is successful and charging is done correctly from the monetary bucket as per the defined rate.
Verify that an email is sent to your emaild ID when the data bundle subscription is about to expire in 10 days, 5 days, or 1 day, or has already expired.

section.title: Provisioning

note.p: Ensure that after creating a record, you distribute it to ME. Otherwise, the provisioning will not be successful.

section.p:
Following entities are required for this use case. Entities for case 2
Entity Task
Notification preferences Select the notification channel as email.
Notification template Create a notification template and add the text to be sent in an email notification.
Notification server Configure a notification server to send an email notification.
Rate Create different rates for volume-based and time-based data consumption.
Charging Service
Create a charging service with the following details:
Bucket: Create a monetary bucket.
Tariff: Create a tariff formula to apply different rates for volume-based or time-based data consumption for the charging service.
Lifecycles Create a subscription, account, and device lifecycles.
Bundles Create a bundle and associate it with subscription lifecycle.
Users Create a user.
Accounts Create an account and associate with an account lifecycle.
Devices Create a device and associate with a bundle and device lifecycle.
